messages.content: I've lived here for over 20 years and I know the area well. I promise to work hard for everyone who needs my help in Ealing Central and Acton. I'm ready to represent you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives will fight crime and give the police all the powers they need.
Secured CCTV for the Haymills estate.
Negotiate a Brexit deal that will safeguard the rights of EU nationals here and British nationals abroad. Establish a new, strong and mutually beneficial relationship with the European Union.

issues.brexitEurope: Conservatives will negotiate a Brexit deal that will safeguard the rights of EU nationals here and British nationals abroad. We will establish a new, strong and mutually beneficial relationship with the European Union.
issues.lawCrime: Conservatives will fight crime and give the police all the powers they need.

community.content: Local Conservative Hanger Hill Councillors Joy Morrissey, Greg Stafford and Nigel Sumner have secured new CCTV for the Haymills estate. Cllr Gregory Stafford said: 'This is great news. We must make sure that there are no hiding places for criminals. We will push for further CCTV and police presence across Hanger Hill.'

leaflet.personalStatement: Since my early twenties I've been travelling the world conducting orchestras, playing the piano and composing. You'll probably have heard my music on TV, radio, and film. I've brought my family up in Acton. I'm a school governor, a Trustee of Acton Charities and a Trustee of the Ealing Music and Film festival. I love Ealing's diverse population, elegant architecture, parks and cultural heritage.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Vlod Barchuk on behalf of Ealing Central and Acton Conservative Association 39 Broughton Road, London W13 8QW. Printed by Print and Design Limited, Uxbridge.

Local Conservative Hanger Hill Councillors Joy Morrissey, Greg Stafford and Nigel Sumner have secured new CCTV for the Haymills estate.
Conservatives will fight crime and give the police all the powers they need.

Conservatives will negotiate a Brexit deal that will safeguard the rights of EU nationals here and British nationals abroad. We will establish a new, strong and mutually beneficial relationship with the European Union.
